EDUCATION.Institute Name: Indian Institute of Technology (Banaras Hindu University), Varanasi

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Study Material and Quiz Mobile Application
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Android application for the preparation of competitive exams (Joint Entrance Examination) was developed using Eclipse and Java. Application provides the question bank, mock test, schedule & important dates, and quiz consisting of 4 options controlled through SQLite android database.

Dynamic representations of solar system which shows multiple views from several directions, and visual exploration of internal and external properties of the 3D phenomena. This was done as a course project for Computer Graphics. Implemented using OpenGL and C# in Visual Studio 2010.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Microsoft Self Serve Display Ads Management Portal
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
- Created a single page web application, wherein user can create advertisement campaigns and see the list of campaigns.
- Integrated web application with Microsoft pubCenter source depot for the D3A REST API calls.
- Used ReactJS for building user interface, Reflux architecture to implement single data flow pattern, React Router for dynamic route matching, Webpack for minification and setting the build system on client side.

This was taken as a course project for Database Systems. User can get detailed information regarding spiritual areas, entertainment hub, hotels, restaurants etc. Website is made social by allowing user to rate & comment on the places. Recommendations based upon rating and distance from the current place. Web content was developed using web2py framework.

Secure multiparty computation in a client-server model where each client connects to the server once and interacts with it, without any other client necessarily being connected at the same time. Implemented protocol for the sum function and achieve security in the semi-honest model. System is implemented in Python.

Developed software for secure data transfer using Cryptography and Steganography in Java and IDE NetBeans. Sender encrypts the sensitive file (audio/video/text/image) using Advanced Encryption Standard (AES 128 bit security key) and then conceals the encrypted file in other cover multimedia file using injection steganography technique. Security key is transferred using RSA cryptosystem.

Windows application to share bills, IOUs, and to make sure that everyone gets paid back. App can be used to split household bills with roommates, to figure out costs for a group etc. User can view his/her balances, track spending trends, and set up email reminders for bills. This application was built in C# and XAML using Visual Basics in Windows 8 under Microsoft Appathan’14 ‘code.fun.do’.
